month_1_flashcards.front: 4 trụ cột của Dopamine Detox trong tháng 1 là gì?
month_1_flashcards.back:
1. Phone screen time max 1h/ngày
2. Không YouTube/social media
3. Sleep schedule 10PM-6AM
4. Meditation 10 phút/ngày

month_1_flashcards.front: Tại sao developers cần dopamine reset?
month_1_flashcards.back:
• Modern life overstimulates dopamine receptors
• Cần 23 phút để recover focus sau interruption
• Dopamine addiction khiến deep work trở nên boring
• Social media/notifications phân mảnh attention

month_1_flashcards.front: Deep work block trong tháng 1 nên bao lâu?
month_1_flashcards.back:
Target: 2-3h/ngày
• Bắt đầu với 90 phút blocks
• Gradually tăng lên 2h
• Phone airplane mode
• No interruptions allowed

month_1_flashcards.front: Checkpoints của tuần 4 tháng 1 là gì?
month_1_flashcards.back:
Complete dopamine reset achieved:
• Stable 6AM wake-up
• Phone usage <1h consistently
• 2h deep work blocks daily
• Feel comfortable without constant stimulation

month_2_flashcards.front: Tại sao context switching nguy hiểm cho developers?
month_2_flashcards.back:
• Reduces IQ temporarily by 10 points
• Takes 23 minutes to regain focus
• 45% tech workers get <4h flow state daily
• Multitasking is a myth - brain actually task-switches

month_2_flashcards.front: Deep work target của tháng 2 là bao nhiêu?
month_2_flashcards.back:
3-4h deep work/ngày:
• Chia thành 2 sessions (2h + 1-2h)
• Use Pomodoro for complex tasks
• Phone airplane mode
• End-of-day shutdown ritual

month_2_flashcards.front: Environmental design principles cho focus là gì?
month_2_flashcards.back:
• Single monitor setup (avoid multi-monitor distraction)
• Clean desktop, minimal icons
• Noise-canceling headphones
• Dedicated workspace separate from relaxation
• Full-screen mode during deep work

month_2_flashcards.front: Email và communication boundaries trong tháng 2?
month_2_flashcards.back:

• Slack/Teams: Batch check mỗi 2h
• Turn off desktop notifications
• Use Focus modes on OS
• Communicate boundaries to team

month_2_flashcards.back:

month_3_flashcards.front: Developer health crisis statistics nào cần biết?
month_3_flashcards.back:

month_3_flashcards.front: Energy equation cho developers là gì?
month_3_flashcards.back:
High Energy = Exercise + Sleep + Nutrition + Recovery
• 30-45min daily exercise
• 7-8h consistent sleep schedule
• Meal prep + hydration
• Posture breaks every 50min

month_3_flashcards.front: Weekly exercise schedule ideal cho developers?
month_3_flashcards.back:
Mon/Wed/Fri: Gym (45min)
Tue/Thu/Sat: Cardio (30min)
Sunday: Rest or yoga
• Morning workout = no scheduling conflicts
• 5-6 sessions/week target

• Consistent 10PM-6AM schedule
• No screens 1h before bed
• Cool (18-20°C), dark, quiet room
• Phone charged outside bedroom
• Blue light filters on devices

• Healthy snacks: nuts, fruits, yogurt
• Max 2 cups coffee before 2PM
• 2.5L water daily
• Optional: 16:8 intermittent fasting
